import pic from '../images/logoSignUpPage.jpg' import { useState } from 'react' import Data from '../data/loginCredentials.json' export default function SignUpPage(){ var [emailId,setEmailId]=useState("") var [password,setPassword]=useState("") var [data,setData]=useState([]) var emailFunction=(e)=>{ setEmailId(e.target.value) } var passwordFunction=(e)=>{ setPassword(e.target.value) } function updateData() { if(emailId!==""&&password!==""){ setData([1,2]) alert(data) alert("Sign Up Successful") } else alert("Invalid Credentials") } return( <>
); }
